definition: to long for/to look forward to/longing/vision for the future

sentences.english: I am looking forward to the future , but I have no reasons to shirk my today-duty.
sentences.chinese: 我憧憬未来，但我没有任何理由逃避今天的责任。

sentences.english: When we feel good, we have abetter perspective on life.
sentences.chinese: 当我们感觉良好的时候，我们憧憬美好的生活。

sentences.english: Still do not understand the joys of life, only know that longing and yearning for innocently.
sentences.chinese: 还不懂得生活的甘苦，只知道傻傻地憧憬和向往。

sentences.english: That longing that if only India also grows as fast as China.
sentences.chinese: 我们憧憬着如果印度能像中国发展的那么快就好了。

sentences.english: India and the United States share a vision of a world free of nuclear weapons.
sentences.chinese: 印度和美国共同憧憬一个没有核武器的未来世界。

sentences.english: The expectationfuture, palely will look at the life.
Some people were starry-eyed about their investment plans.
sentences.chinese: 一些人士不现实地憧憬他们的投资计划。

sentences.english: Can spell out with a floor tile the personal longing to domesticity .
sentences.chinese: 用一块一块的地砖可以拼出自己对家庭生活的憧憬。

sentences.english: The prospect of Christmas left the children agog .
sentences.chinese: 对圣诞节的憧憬使得孩子们兴奋不已。

sentences.english: Perspective is a good thing to learn.
sentences.chinese: 憧憬是一件需要学习的好东西。

sentences.english: Our little romatic friend formed visions of future for herself.
sentences.chinese: 我们的小朋友一脑袋幻想，憧憬着美好的未来。

sentences.english: We should learn from yesterday, cherish today and hope for tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该感悟过去，珍惜现在，憧憬未来。

sentences.english: After every wild, stimulating short-term pleasure of life is going to paralysis.
sentences.chinese: 每次狂野过后，刺激快感短暂的麻痹了对生活的憧憬。

sentences.english: The room's style exemplifies his ideal of beauty and plainness.
sentences.chinese: 这个房间的风格表明了他对美与质朴的憧憬。

sentences.english: I grew up in the Midwest, which shaped my expectations of the world.
sentences.chinese: 我在米德韦斯特长大，这里影响了我对世界的憧憬。

sentences.english: Lai snow and MoLing days feel happiness, two people together to look forward to the future.
sentences.chinese: 莱雪和莫凌天都感觉到幸福，两人一起憧憬未来。

definition: to yearn for/to look forward to
hope and expectation/to anticipate/to look forward to/to await expectantly
to expect/to look forward to/anxious for sth/to hope (to get sth)
reverie/daydream/to be lost in wild and fanciful thoughts
to have one's heart filled with/(to collide) full on/(of farm animals) heavy with young
to miss/to long for/to remember with longing/yearning
